page.title: 08POLITICS
page.content: In a survey of second year pupils about their political opinions we received a variety of replies. 40% supported the CONSERVATIVE PARTY 30% supported the LABOUR PARTY ,10% supported the ECOLOGY PARTY and 20% were uncommitted. The local M.P. is M.Miller(LABOUR),the Regional Councillor is P.Waters(LABOUR),the District Councillors are R.Cameron and A.Chalmers(both CONSERVATIVE).Generally speaking the majority of voters in the town vote CONSERATIVE while in the area around Strathaven e.g. East Kilbride they vote LABOUR.The survey therefore shows a similar pattern to those of adults in the town so it looks as if the 1990 elections will have the same results as the last ones__perhaps someone would care to check our prediction?
